sources.title: Young Buffalo Bill
sources.description: Bill Cody (Roy Rogers) and friend Gabby Whitaker (George Hayes) are called on by the US Army to survey the New Mexico territory. Don Regas (Hugh Sothern) is not happy with the survey since he feels that the Army is out to cheat or rob him of his rightful land, but is assured by Cody that all will be fair. The Don's friend Emelio Montez (Trevor Bardette) is actually trying to acquire part of the Don's land since there is a rich gold mine on the property and calls on his half-brother, a renegade Indian chief Akuna (Chief Thundercloud) to kill the Don so that the claim will be open and ready for filing, especially when the surveyor is in the debt to Montez and fixes the boundaries so the land is open for anyone to file. When Cody learns of Montez' plot, he races to protect the claim as well as the Don's daughter Tonia (Pauline Moore) from Akuna's wrath.

sources.title: Young Buffalo Bill (1940) ROY ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Pauline Moore
Director: Joseph Kane

Buffalo Bill gets in a fight over mining lands in New Mexico. Indians besiege a Spanish ranch and the U.S. Cavalry rides to the rescue!

metadata.Plot: It's 1860 and the old Spanish land grants are being surveyed. Montez is after part of Don Regas' rancho and gets the surveyor to alter the boundary. But Don Regas still has the original grant written on a bandanna. Montez sends Indians after it but Bill Cody and Gabby fight them off and a wounded Gabby unknowingly ends up with the missing million dollar deed wrapped around his arm for a bandage.
metadata.Writer: Harrison Jacobs, Robert Yost, Gerald Geraghty
metadata.Actors: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Pauline Moore
